Here is a Markdown document with the requested blockquote structures.

> This blockquote contains **bold text** to emphasize a point and *italicized text* for subtle distinction.
> It demonstrates basic inline formatting within a single level.

> You can include [hyperlinks](https://github.com) and `inline code` snippets like `struct JP;` inside a blockquote.
> This is useful for referencing technical documentation or specific implementation details.

> This level contains a ~~strikethrough~~ element.
> > This is a nested blockquote.
> > > This is a triple-nested blockquote, showing **deep** hierarchy.
> Nested structures help in representing threaded conversations or hierarchical data.
